In rerun::external

rerun::external

Crate re_entity_db

Source
Expand description

This is how we store and index logging data.

§Feature flags

  • serde — Enable (de)serialization using serde.

Modules§

  • entity_db
  • entity_tree
  • external

Structs§

  • EntityDb
    An in-memory database built from a stream of LogMsges.
  • EntityPath
    The unique identifier of an entity, e.g. camera/3/points
  • EntityPathPart
    The different parts that make up an EntityPath.
  • EntityTree
    A recursive, manually updated ChunkStoreSubscriber that maintains the entity hierarchy.
  • InstancePath
    The path to either a specific instance of an entity, or the whole entity.
  • InstancePathHash
    Hashes of the components of an InstancePath.
  • TimeHistogramPerTimeline
    Number of messages per time per timeline.
  • TimeInt
    A 64-bit number describing either nanoseconds, sequence numbers or fully static data.
  • Timeline
    A time frame/space, e.g. log_time or frame_nr, coupled with the type of time it keeps.
  • TimesPerTimeline
    A ChunkStoreSubscriber that keeps track of all unique timestamps on each Timeline.
  • VersionedInstancePath
    A versioned path (i.e. pinned to a specific RowId) to either a specific instance of an entity, or the whole entity.
  • VersionedInstancePathHash
    Hashes of the components of a VersionedInstancePath.

Enums§

  • Error
    The errors that can occur when misusing the chunk store.
  • TimeQuery
    A query in time.

Constants§

  • DEFAULT_GC_TIME_BUDGET
    See GarbageCollectionOptions::time_budget.

Type Aliases§

  • Result
  • TimeCounts
  • TimeHistogram
    Number of messages per time.
